option.name: content
option.value:
Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details.
Use emojis
Bullet points

list.name: Changes
list.comment:
- âœ¨ **Revamp Network, Reflection, and Serializer Systems** - Added new command handling framework with `Command`, `Commands`, and console UI for in-game interaction. - Introduced `ConnectCommand` and `HostCommand` for network operations. - Added powerful reflection utilities with `UdeaReflections` for project registration and type scanning. - Implemented `AssetReferenceSerializer` and `SerializableSerializer` for streamlined serialization. - Enhanced pooling with better serialization strategies for network packets (e.g., `EntityUpdate`, `AbilityPacket`). - Replaced obsolete community serializers with custom reflection-based alternatives. - ðŸš€ Improved `Box2DSystem` with safe component access (`getOrNull`) for compact hitbox detection.
- ðŸ”¥ **Remove Legacy Serializers and Obsolete Files** - Deleted outdated `EntityUpdateSerializer` and related infrastructure. - Removed legacy `types.kt` and redundant duplication across the codebase.
- ðŸ› ï¸ **Refactor and Optimize Across Networking and ECS** - Refactored `NetworkPacket`, `CommandPacket`, and `EntityCreate` for clarity and consistency. - Improved ECS system inheritance with better `family` handling in systems like `NetworkServerSystem` and `EditorSystem`. - ðŸŒŸ Introduced cleaner, context-oriented design patterns for future scalability.
- ðŸŽ¨ **Code Cleanup and Project Simplification** - Streamlined networking utilities for improved maintainability. - Modularized code architecture to separate concerns (e.g., moved core systems under `command` and `serde`).
- âœ¨ **Big Step Toward Modular Game Systems**

task.summary:
Add ECS systems and components for abilities, rendering, and debug
Introduced new systems and components to enhance game mechanics, including Ability and Attribute systems for gameplay effects, rendering systems for lights and camera tracking, and debugging capabilities. These changes also remove obsolete code, integrate with Compose UI, and expand core functionality.

Refactor ECS components and systems for improved structure
Updated package structure for ECS components and systems, ensuring better organization and alignment with their purposes. Removed obsolete code, standardized naming conventions, and integrated support for additional features including rendering, Box2D, and debugging. Additional changes enhance modularity and maintainability of the game framework.

Refactor game asset management and ECS system handling
Reorganized asset management and ECS system architecture for improved modularity and maintainability. Added `GameAssetManager` and updated components to standardize registration processes. Introduced additional refinements in rendering and debug systems, enabling better extensibility and functionality.

Add Blueprint and Entity Definition editors along with system upgrades
Introduced new BlueprintEditor and EntityDefinitionEditor to enhance the editor's capabilities. Added input handling, updated systems for editor/runtime compatibility, and extended components like Sprite and Physics for advanced configuration. Refactored and improved asset handling, world setup, and system configurations.
Enhance README and streamline workspace configuration.

- ðŸ”¥ **Remove outdated plugins & editors** - Dropped numerous legacy implementations: `UBlueprintEditor`, `UEditor` subclasses, and Sprite-related classes. - ðŸš€ **Introduce DSL improvements** - Added new KotlinScript support with `UdeaScriptConfiguration`. - New DSL creation utilities (`createObject`, `ListBuilder`, etc.). - ðŸŒŸ **Launch Gradle plugin enhancements** - Added `AssetScanner` for asset management and a Maven publishing setup.

ðŸ”¥ **Remove obsolete editors and tests**
- Eliminated unused editors such as `LevelEditor`, `BlueprintEditor`, and `EntityDefinitionEditor`. - Removed outdated test files and associated implementations. - Cleaned up redundant DSL definitions and file types for better maintainability. - Streamlined project by discarding legacy Swing-based UI editors.

- ðŸ”¥ **Remove legacy GameConfig and improve asset handling** - Removed `GameConfig` and its usage across various systems. - Introduced `GameConfig` as an asset for flexible and dynamic configuration loading. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) with new `isSensor` property. - Added support for Box2D chains in `Box2DSystem`. - ðŸŽ¨ Improved particle effect handling via `Particle` asset and associated loader. - ðŸš€ Streamlined script evaluation and asset loading with flexible configurations. - ðŸ› ï¸ Refactored networking annotations (`@Networked` to `@UdeaNetworked`). - General cleanup and architecture enhancements.

- âœ¨ **Add Animation System Enhancements** - Introduced `AnimationSet` component and its supporting systems for sprite animation management. - Added `AnimationSetSystem` for animation handling with dynamic framing and notifies support. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) to attach entities via `userData`. - ðŸš€ Improved networking with updated sync annotations (`@UdeaSync`) and packet modifications. - ðŸŽ¨ Updated assets with `SpriteSheet`, `SpriteAnimation`, and notify-related features. - Introduced Kotlin `context` receivers for ECS system utility functions. - ðŸ› Miscellaneous config adjustments: enabled context-sensitive resolution for Kotlin compilation.

MESSAGE.value:
Add ECS systems and components for abilities, rendering, and debug
Introduced new systems and components to enhance game mechanics, including Ability and Attribute systems for gameplay effects, rendering systems for lights and camera tracking, and debugging capabilities. These changes also remove obsolete code, integrate with Compose UI, and expand core functionality.

Refactor ECS components and systems for improved structure
Updated package structure for ECS components and systems, ensuring better organization and alignment with their purposes. Removed obsolete code, standardized naming conventions, and integrated support for additional features including rendering, Box2D, and debugging. Additional changes enhance modularity and maintainability of the game framework.

Refactor game asset management and ECS system handling
Reorganized asset management and ECS system architecture for improved modularity and maintainability. Added `GameAssetManager` and updated components to standardize registration processes. Introduced additional refinements in rendering and debug systems, enabling better extensibility and functionality.

Add Blueprint and Entity Definition editors along with system upgrades
Introduced new BlueprintEditor and EntityDefinitionEditor to enhance the editor's capabilities. Added input handling, updated systems for editor/runtime compatibility, and extended components like Sprite and Physics for advanced configuration. Refactored and improved asset handling, world setup, and system configurations.

Upgrade project architecture and asset handling.
Refactored asset management by introducing `GameAssetLoader` for standardized loading and handling of assets. Enhanced ECS system configurations with runtime compatibility improvements and editor support. Updated dependencies, JVM compatibility to Java 17, and added Maven publishing configuration with source JARs.
Enhance README and streamline workspace configuration.

Remove legacy editors, integration tests, and obsolete code.
Replaced old DSLs and asset structures with new Kotlin scripting, `UdeaDsl`, and improved asset factories. Introduced Gradle plugin for asset scanning and Maven publishing configuration. Added network code generator setup while upgrading compatibility to JVM 17. Restructured test and plugin files for streamlined IDE support.

- **Remove outdated plugins & editors** - Dropped numerous legacy implementations: `UBlueprintEditor`, `UEditor` subclasses, and Sprite-related classes. - **Introduce DSL improvements** - Added new KotlinScript support with `UdeaScriptConfiguration`. - New DSL creation utilities (`createObject`, `ListBuilder`, etc.). - **Launch Gradle plugin enhancements** - Added `AssetScanner` for asset management and a Maven publishing setup.

- âœ¨ **Introduce @DslInclude annotation support** - Added `@DslInclude` to enable property inclusion within asset DSLs. - Refactored parameter handling in DSL processors for improved readability and modularity. - Enhanced Gradle plugin with better parameter assignments and custom property validation.

**Remove obsolete editors and tests**
- Eliminated unused editors such as `LevelEditor`, `BlueprintEditor`, and `EntityDefinitionEditor`. - Removed outdated test files and associated implementations. - Cleaned up redundant DSL definitions and file types for better maintainability. - Streamlined project by discarding legacy Swing-based UI editors.

**Remove obsolete editors and tests**
- Eliminated unused editors such as `LevelEditor`, `BlueprintEditor`, and `EntityDefinitionEditor`. - Removed outdated test files and associated implementations. - Cleaned up redundant DSL definitions and file types for better maintainability. - Streamlined project by discarding legacy Swing-based UI editors.

- **Remove legacy GameConfig and improve asset handling** - Removed `GameConfig` and its usage across various systems. - Introduced `GameConfig` as an asset for flexible and dynamic configuration loading. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) with new `isSensor` property. - Added support for Box2D chains in `Box2DSystem`. - Improved particle effect handling via `Particle` asset and associated loader. - Streamlined script evaluation and asset loading with flexible configurations. - ï¸ Refactored networking annotations (`@Networked` to `@UdeaNetworked`). - General cleanup and architecture enhancements.

- **Remove legacy GameConfig and improve asset handling** - Removed `GameConfig` and its usage across various systems. - Introduced `GameConfig` as an asset for flexible and dynamic configuration loading. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) with new `isSensor` property. - Added support for Box2D chains in `Box2DSystem`. - Improved particle effect handling via `Particle` asset and associated loader. - Streamlined script evaluation and asset loading with flexible configurations. - ï¸ Refactored networking annotations (`@Networked` to `@UdeaNetworked`). - General cleanup and architecture enhancements.

- âœ¨ **Add Animation System Enhancements** - Introduced `AnimationSet` component and its supporting systems for sprite animation management. - Added `AnimationSetSystem` for animation handling with dynamic framing and notifies support. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) to attach entities via `userData`. - Improved networking with updated sync annotations (`@UdeaSync`) and packet modifications. - Updated assets with `SpriteSheet`, `SpriteAnimation`, and notify-related features. - Introduced Kotlin `context` receivers for ECS system utility functions. - Miscellaneous config adjustments: enabled context-sensitive resolution for Kotlin compilation.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - âœ¨ **Add Animation System Enhancements** - Introduced `AnimationSet` component and its supporting systems for sprite animation management. - Added `AnimationSetSystem` for animation handling with dynamic framing and notifies support. - Enhanced physics components (`Box`, `Capsule`, `Circle`, `Chain`) to attach entities via `userData`. - Improved networking with updated sync annotations (`@UdeaSync`) and packet modifications. - Updated assets with `SpriteSheet`, `SpriteAnimation`, and notify-related features. - Introduced Kotlin `context` receivers for ECS system utility functions. - Miscellaneous config adjustments: enabled context-sensitive resolution for Kotlin compilation.
